donor_name: ARAB GULF PROGRAMME FOR UN DEVELOPMENT &
outputs.output_descr: CAWTAR, Center for Arab Women Training and Research was set up in Tunis in 1993 and has established a solid reputation as a source of information and expertise throughout the Arab region. In 2001 it completed its first Arab Women Development Report, dealing with globalization This project covers the strengthening of CAWTAR as an institution and its four main programmes: annual report; training on gender equality, employment promotion, and poverty eradication; advocacy and the media; and collection of gender disaggregated information.

project_descr: Support to the Centre for Arab Women's Training and Research - Phase III
